p.k: Just Like Robots / Opposites Attract / The Thing in the Wall / Madtrap Axel and the team find themselves bested by Madcap when the baddie uses their digital devices to track their every move in combat forcing our heroes to act unpredictably. / Claiming he's good at heart, Dynamo convinces Axel and the team to help him find a battery that can power his centrifuge and free him from Madtrap's control. / When Axel and the team accuse Galileo of stealing their possessions the lizard must hunt down the true culprit - a mysterious creature behind the wall - to prove his innocence. / Madcap and Princess SugarSalt trap Axel and the team inside a Minergy-powered labyrinth that attacks them with their greatest fears.
